original_text: On one Jewish day of rest, Jesus and his disciples were walking through some fields where wheat was growing. While they were walking along, his disciples picked some grains of wheat.
korean_text: 안식일에 예수께서 밀밭 사이로 지나가실새 그의 제자들이 길을 열며 이삭을 자르니

sentences.original_text: On one Jewish day of rest
Jesus and his disciples were walking
through some fields where wheat was growing
his disciples picked some grains of wheat
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자들이 밀 이삭을 몇 개 뽑았습니다
